title: Gold Coins In Custom Games
body: I think we should have an option in **Custom Games** that would let us choose the amount of **Gold Coins** we could start of with. I think this would be a great idea, $$$ for *DAYZZZ*

replies.body: Next step to improve the game

voted yes.... I suggest you guys all watch this 15 second video

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=e605fadOt0k

> [{quoted}](name=ROTTNPELICNHOOF,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=cMlwt2qU,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-01-18T11:07:32.297+0000)
>
> voted yes.... I suggest you guys all watch this 15 second video
> 
> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=e605fadOt0k

%%%% off with your self-promotion on everything. Reported for spamming.
dude.. please don't cry... Im just joining in on the LoL fun and sharing something that I like with my fellow Summoners. You need to lighten up a bit brah
It would make it so much easier to test a build instead of having to farm up (provided you can also decide which level to start at).

The only way to "test" a build is to play, the same build will never perform the same way twice, thats why builds are always meant to change depending on the situation, if you stick to one build path 100% of the time, you are playing wrong
Yeah, but testing builds that you would get flamed at for building in norms, like full crit/attack speed ashe just for the fun of it.
Honestly a sham that this STILL isn't an option in custom.
